title: Stock market returns to be ‘violently flat’ amid slowing growth: Strategist - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market returns to be ‘violently flat’ amid slowing growth: Strategist  Yahoo Finance
description: While some experts are beginning to sound the alarm over the threat of stagflation for the remainder of 2022, a combination of surging inflation and slowing growth poses an ever-growing risk to markets. 22V Research founder Dennis DeBusschere believes that investors should indeed expect stock market returns to be muted in the medium term.
